name.ja: レジェンド・セイバー

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, place 1 monster from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.

effect.en: This card gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can add 1 Warrior Type Legend monster from your Graveyard to your hand. If you do, you can only attack with Celestial Warrior or Warrior Type monsters this turn.
